pages.text: Void of the De-buff can make the target fragile, shorten the interval between injuries. $(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(t:Raising the Duration can increase gains)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()
